item.title: Sarasota Guided Mangrove Tunnel Kayak Tour
item.description: Increase your chances of spotting manatees and dolphins during an eco-friendly kayak tour of the Lido Key in Sarasota. Ideal for lovers of nature and wildlife, this experience lets you escape the crowds on land and is suitable for both beginner and advanced paddlers. Plus, traveling in a non-motorized vessel means you’re less likely to scare away animals.

image.alt: Sarasota Guided Mangrove Tunnel Kayak Tour

item.title: TreeUmph Adventure Course
item.description: Reserve your place in advance to save time on vacation and unleash your inner Tarzan with this ticket to the TreeUmph! Adventure Course in Bradenton. Enter the park and swing into action on the ziplines, ropes, bridges, and cargo nets between the pine trees, bonding with friends and family as you brave the challenges. Adults’ and childrens’ courses, full instructions, all equipment, and a choice of time slots are included.

image.alt: TreeUmph Adventure Course

item.title: Sarasota Mangrove Tunnel Guided Kayak Adventure
item.description: With this small-group tour, get on the water and kayak along Sarasota Bay to the world-famous Lido Key mangrove tunnels. After a detailed paddle and kayak operation lesson, venture into the open water. Search for wildlife encounters with manatees, dolphins, stingrays, eagles, and other animals before kayaking through clear water under the protective canopy of mangrove forests.

image.alt: Sarasota Mangrove Tunnel Guided Kayak Adventure

item.title: Siesta Key Electric Bike Sunset Tour
item.description: Enjoy one of Florida's best beaches at sunset on an electric bike tour. With 5-level pedal assist and an on-demand throttle, the electric bike allows you to put in as much or as little effort as you want as you ride along Siesta Key. All experience levels are welcome. Booking in advance ensures you won't miss out on this small-group tour.

image.alt: Siesta Key Electric Bike Sunset Tour

item.title: City Sightseeing Trolley Tour of Sarasota
item.description: Discover the best of Sarasota, Florida as you embark on a sightseeing tour of the city. Climb aboard your air-conditioned vehicle and see several points of interest including the Ringling Museum and College, Selby Library, and the Sarasota Opera House. While you ride, learn about the vibrant history and culture of the city from your guide.

image.alt: City Sightseeing Trolley Tour of Sarasota

item.title: Mangroves, Manatees, and a Hidden Beach: Kayak Tour
item.description: Immerse yourself in Sarasota's coastal mangrove forests, look out for dolphins and manatees, and practice your kayaking or stand-up paddleboarding skills on this immersive, small-group tour. After departing from Ted Sperling Nature Park, you'll paddle out on Sarasota Bay and can practice with your equipment. Then, head into the mangrove tunnels for your best chance to see local marine life.

image.alt: Mangroves, Manatees, and a Hidden Beach: Kayak Tour

item.title: Clear Kayak LED Night Glass Bottom Tour - Sarasota
item.description: Glide through the water in an illuminated glass-bottom kayak on a private nighttime tour of Sarasota. Learn about Sarasota’s coastal ecosystem as you paddle over mangroves and grass flats, viewing marine life such as dolphins and manatees. Plus, exploring with your own personal guide means you’ll enjoy undivided attention.

image.alt: Clear Kayak LED Night Glass Bottom Tour - Sarasota

item.title: Myakka State Park E-bike Safari
item.description: We have been avid explorers of Myakka River State Park for the better part of two decades and have been operating tours for nearly 5 years so our knowledge and expertise of the park and it's wildlife inhabitants is unmatched! Our guides are also extremely proficient in photography so you will leave with plenty of great photo mementos at no additional cost! Perhaps what makes our experience the most unique is that our top of the line E-bikes allow you to choose how much effort you put into the ride. Put your assist level low and get some exercise or allow the bike to do all the work and see the entire park sweat-free.

image.alt: Myakka State Park E-bike Safari

item.title: Amish Experience Trolley Tour: Bridges to Understanding
item.description: For something different than beaches, discover one of Sarasota's most unique communities on an insider’s tour of Pinecraft, an Amish vacation enclave right on the outskirts of town. Led by a guide with personal connections to the local Amish and Mennonite communities, learn about their roots in Florida, traditional customs, and beliefs. You’ll also have the chance to shop for handmade gifts and sample famous pie at an Amish cafe.

image.alt: Amish Experience Trolley Tour: Bridges to Understanding

item.title: Taste of Downtown Sarasota- A Walking/Culinary Tour
item.description: Discover the delectable highlights of Sarasota's thriving dining scene on this small-group, dinnertime tasting tour. Meet your guide in central Sarasota, and come with an appetite: you'll visit up to five local restaurants, and will enjoy enough samples to add up to a generous meal (alcoholic drinks additional expense). As you go, soak up the convivial atmosphere, and learn more about Sarasota's unique culture and culinary offerings.

image.alt: Taste of Downtown Sarasota- A Walking/Culinary Tour

item.title: 90-Minute Parasailing Adventure Above Anna Maria Island, FL
item.description: This lesson provides everything beginners need to go parasailing above Bradenton Beach and Anna Maria Island: all parasailing equipment, safety instructions, and a motorboat with an experienced crew. Meet at the Bradenton Beach Marina, get harnessed up, and parasail in groups of two or three on approximately 10-minute sessions.

image.alt: 90-Minute Parasailing Adventure Above Anna Maria Island, FL

item.title: Siesta Key Guided Eco Tour
item.description: Right by Sarasota, an eco paradise awaits: Siesta Key, a barrier island with mangrove forests, dolphins, manatees, and a wealth of native birds. Discover it a more sustainable way on this small-group guided tour by single or tandem kayak, with time to visit a hidden beach and search for seashells and shark’s teeth. No experience is necessary: Your guide sets a mellow pace and can help with technique if needed.

image.alt: Siesta Key Guided Eco Tour

item.title: Lido Key Pedal Kayak Tour in Sarasota
item.description: Just west of Sarasota’s city streets, you’ll find the serene shores of Lido Key. Get acquainted with Liquid Blue Outfitters and jump on a unique kayaking tour. You’ll meet at Bird Key Park Preserve where your guide will have a kayak, paddle, and dry bag waiting for you. Explore the marine life around the park, keeping an eye out for marine life swimming nearby.

image.alt: Lido Key Pedal Kayak Tour in Sarasota

item.title: Half-Day Private Sarasota Charter Tour with Wildlife Watching
item.description: Escape the mainland for half a day, and discover some of coastal Florida's most picture-perfect scenery, on this private, half-day boat charter. Pick between morning and afternoon start times, and make your own way to the dock. You can spot manatee and dolphins in Heron Lagoon and Casey Key, see a historic swing bridge, stop at a tropical beach for shelling, pause at a tiki for drinks and snacks (own expense), and more.

image.alt: Half-Day Private Sarasota Charter Tour with Wildlife Watching

item.title: Clear Kayak LED Night Glass Bottom Tour - Siesta Key, FL
item.description: Experience a whole new side of Florida on this private guided kayaking tour around the waters of Siesta Key. The LED lights fitted to the bottom light up the nighttime waters and the transparent kayaks let you see under the water like never before. Keep a lookout for manatees, dolphins, and other marine wildlife while you paddle through the night.

image.alt: Clear Kayak LED Night Glass Bottom Tour - Siesta Key, FL

item.title: Murder Mystery Trolley: Who Killed The Circus Queen?
item.description: Combine a trolley ride with drinks and live entertainment on this interactive murder mystery trolley experience in Sarasota. Audience participation encouraged: get into the spirit by donning a circus costume and reading lines from a script, and see if you can help solve the mystery of who killed the circus queen. Includes alcoholic beverages.

image.alt: Murder Mystery Trolley: Who Killed The Circus Queen?

item.title: Siesta Key Kayak Tour
item.description: Discover the calm waterways around Siesta Key, just outside of Sarasota, on this small-group excursion. Choose a kayak or stand up paddleboard, whichever you are more comfortable with, for your journey. Then, follow your guide through the Jim Neville Marine Preserve observing mangrove islands and local wildlife while you paddle towards a secret beach.

image.alt: Siesta Key Kayak Tour

item.title: Haunted Sarasota Trolley: Ghost Stories, Mysteries, Spooky Fun
item.description: Learn about Sarasota’s history of gruesome murders, unexplained happenings, and supernatural events—and immerse yourself in the city’s spooky ambiance—on this haunted trolley tour. Grab a wine or beer, hop aboard the air-conditioned trolley, and set off as your costumed guide regales you with creepy stories. Discover the city’s most supposedly haunted landmarks as you go—and even witness reenactments of macabre past events.

image.alt: Haunted Sarasota Trolley: Ghost Stories, Mysteries, Spooky Fun

item.title: HydroCats - 2 Hour CraigCat Sightseeing Tour
item.description: Explore the waterways of Sarasota Bay, Bird Key, and Lido Key on a compact two-seater catamaran. Discover a new side of Florida on these unique little speedboats, soaking up the sun and scenery. Make sure you keep your eyes peeled for dolphins and other marine wildlife as you enjoy the adventure.

image.alt: HydroCats - 2 Hour CraigCat Sightseeing Tour

item.title: Circus Secrets of Sarasota
item.description: Sarasota has a history unlike most cities—one that’s embedded with tales of the circus and its special performers. Avoid guidebooks and book this Sarasota Circus Secrets History Tour led by a circus historian. Hear stories and commentary about the city’s performing past and its quirky art and culture scene, including tales of showmen and performers of the circus.

image.alt: Circus Secrets of Sarasota

item.title: Manatee Discovery Anna Maria Island
item.description: Explore the waters of Anna Maria, Florida with the help of an experienced naturalist for a guide to help you spot manatees in the wild. Paddle your way around the waterways with a local to tell you all about the area’s ecosystem as you sightsee on the water. Stop at Beer Can Island to explore on land too.

image.alt: Manatee Discovery Anna Maria Island

item.title: Parasailing Adventure in Anna Maria Island
item.description: See Florida’s Anna Maria Island from a different perspective as you soar above in a parasail. Join a small group and set sail from the marina for the perfect location to begin your flight. Then, gear up and feel the wind beneath you as you soar high above the water, taking in the panoramic views.

image.alt: Parasailing Adventure in Anna Maria Island

item.title: Clear Kayak LED Night Glass Bottom Tour - Anna Maria Island
item.description: Discover a side of Florida most tourists will never see on this guided nighttime kayaking tour around the waters of Anna Maria Island. The LED lights fitted to the bottom of these transparent kayaks light up the dark waters and let you see the world hidden below. A guide is on hand to make sure everyone is safe and having fun.

image.alt: Clear Kayak LED Night Glass Bottom Tour - Anna Maria Island

item.title: 4 Hour Private Charter
item.description: Sarasota has a coveted spot on Florida’s Gulf Coast, offering dazzling sunsets and hours of warm weather. Take a break from the renowned beaches and hop aboard a private charter boat for more fun in the sun. This private charter allows you to pick the activities for your excursion. Ride to beaches and sandbars. Bring drinks to create your own booze cruise. Swim and snorkel or simply see the sunset from the water.

image.alt: 4 Hour Private Charter
